source.name: Final Critical Habitat for Kokia drynarioides (koki'o)
source.description: Abstract: To provide the user with a general idea of areas where final critical habitat for Kokia drynarioides (koki'o) occur based on the based on the description provided in the Federal Register documentation.     Purpose: Critical habitat are areas considered essential for the conservation of a listed species. These areas provide notice to the public and land managers the importance of these areas to the conservation of this species. Special protections and/or restrictions are possible in areas where federal funding, permits, licenses, authorizations, or actions occur or are required.
